document_data.name: Jonczer
document_data.mainbody: '''Jonczer''' was one of the apprentices of Lady [[Maerjanthra Shalace]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Jonczer worked under [[Maerjanthra Shalace]], the jeweler.
document_data.History:
Jonczer was one of Maerjanthra Shalace's apprentices while she was alive. He was working under her since at least approximately the {{YearlinkName|1351}}, the birth of [[Narnra Shalace]], who was twenty or twenty-two years old in the {{YearlinkName|1373}}. At that time, he was told of Maerjanthra's plot to bear [[Elminster Aumar]] a child, on which she was aided by [[Khelben Arunsun]], who under duress from [[Mystra]] gave her a potion to override Elminster's control over his own fertility, as accounted by his fellow apprentice, Goraun.

Shortly after Maerjanthra's death, Jonczer disappeared after a break-in killed his fellow apprentice [[Rorgel]]. Narnra assumed Jonczer was dead, though she saw a lot of blood and never actually spotted the body.
